column4: Seems like I need to upgrade alsa to 1.0.15 to correct a problem with my mic.
Anyone know if I can run the packages from Debian sid (or from hardy, but they are not all at 1.0.15), on my Gutsy system?
should work, but no guarentees, may be better off compiling from source
OK, thanks, it seems like all dependencies are satisfied for the sid packages, so I'll give it a shot
